Please improve the Android app video quality features.

text: This is the app the Drs at UCSF use to conduct video office appointments. It is easy to use, works great, and has saved us HOURS of driving, in heavy, commuter traffic, for each appointment! I got all of the lab work and imaging done locallu, and I've only had to go down to SF (a 2+ hour drive) for the actual procedure the Dr had to perform. Saved us time, money, wear & tear on our vehicle, and stress, as well as kept us out of the germ- laden close contact of the big city. Love it!
